attributes.action: Instruct the Crown Prosecution Service, to bring some MPs to a court of law, to answer crimes of Fraud and Corupting Public Morals
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is to decide whether it is in the intrest of the public whether they want to decide whether some MP's who took deliberate and false advantage of the Public Purse, to be brought to justice to answer for their false claims, this will show if it is truely in the publics intrest.

rejection.details: The Crown Prosecution Service must deicde independently if there is a case to answer based on the evidence of police investigations into suspected crimes.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
